long_description: Harness the power of the sun to purify water during your backcountry advnetures. The Puralytics SolarBag water purifier delivers clean drinking water without electricity, chemicals or external light. Sunlight, even on a cloudy day, activates the purification capability embedded in a nanotechnology-coated cloth filter. That activation then activates the 5 photochemical processes necessary to purify water and reduce or destroy protozoa, bacteria and viruses found in water. SolarBag treats 3 liters in 2 - 6 hrs. depending on available sunlight and color of water; bag is lightweight, durable and easy to transport. Puralytics SolarBag Water Purifier and filter can be reused hundreds of times.
